TV Rating:  TV-14 LV:  No member of the list in the title.  Raymond "Red" Reddington, a wanted FBI fugitive starts working for the Bureau. He will only ask for one condition: to speak only to profiler Elizabeth Keen.

isim: Blood Must Have Blood, Part Two
description: Cage's stubborn refusal to release the captive ark members and his unwillingness to begin negotiations towards a peaceful resolution forces Clarke to make a drastic and difficult decision. Meanwhile, Chancellor Jaha reaches his goal; and discovers it is not at all what he expected.

isim: Blood Must Have Blood, Part One
description: A major setback halts Wick and Raven's plans. Jasper and Maya are witnesses to a horrible act.
Bellamy fights against time to save his friends. While getting ready for battle, Lexa and Clarke argue about what to do next.
Lexa's leadership decisions are questioned by Clarke. Meanwhile, Abby struggles to help an injured Kane.

The tension between Clarke and Abby comes to a head after Clarke crosses the line. Octavia fights for someone she loves while Raven helps Bellamy navigate Mount Weather. Jaha and Murphy encounter a stranger who may not be what they seem to be.
Brutal consequences are faced by Bellamy and Lincoln. Meanwhile, Abby fights to stay in control; and Jasper confronts President Wallace.
Lexa and Indra decide to make a deal with Clarke. As an alliance falls apart, Monty must enact a dangerous plan.
Clarke strikes a deal with Lexa and Indra. Meanwhile, an alliance is threatened; and Monty comes up with a risky plan.
Clarke returns to Camp Jaha with troubling news. Meanwhile, Finn struggles with the aftermath of his actions.
A dangerous secret is revealed by Bellamy and Octavia.
Clarke heads with a group to Mount Weather to try and shut down their radio jamming tower. Bellamy and Octavia get into a dangerous encounter Lincoln.
Kane attempts to make peace with the Grounders, an emergency causes Jasper to enter a risky medical procedure, and the search for Clarke leads Finn to some violent actions.
Clarke is betrayed by someone she trusted. Meanwhile, Bellamy, Finn and Murphy (Richard Harmon) race to save a stranger; and tensions rise between Raven and Wick (Steve Talley).
Clarke gains an unlikely ally. Later, Abby confesses to committing a crime.
Clarke confronts Dante Wallace (Raymond J. Barry). Meanwhile, Kane interrogates one of the 100; and Abby performs emergency surgery.
An enemy returns in the Season 2 premiere. Later, Jaha makes a heroic decision.
Conclusion. Bellamy forces Octavia to make a difficult decision in the Season 1 finale. Later, Finn takes a risk.
Part 1 of 2. Clarke and Finn face a new enemy. Meanwhile, Bellamy saves Jasper.

After losing nearly all food supplies through a fire, the remaining "100" are forced to go hunting despite the constant threat of the Grounders. Clarke and Finn are caught up in the aftermath of bombing the bridge and may have to pay a high price ... Meanwhile on the Ark: Councillor Kane goes to great lengths to find and save survivors in the repercussion of major destruction.  moreless
After one of the 100 return to camp with a virus, getting many of them sick, Octavia, Finn, Jasper, and Raven devise a plot to try to hold off the grounders from war.

Both the ARC and the 100 celebrate Unity Day. The ARC is devastated by first an explosion, then an attempted coup. Meanwhile, on the ground, Clarke, Finn, and Octavia set up a meeting with the grounders.
Clarke and Bellamy search for supplies as winter nears. Meanwhile, Octavia helps a friend escape.
Clarke finally makes contact with the arch and Bellamy brings a grounder to the camp to try to get some answers.
Bellamy and his crew search for Octavia. Meanwhile, Raven notices a connection between Finn and Clarke.
Finn and Clarke's new relationship becomes a little more complicated. Octavia is knocked out and abducted by a Grounder.
Clarke and Finn grow closer as they try to communicate with the Ark. Meanwhile, Bellamy maintains order within the group.
An antibiotic is sought to treat Jasper's wounds. Meanwhile, Bellamy and his crew hunt for food.
A search-and-rescue mission ends in surprise. Meanwhile, Raven helps Abby craft an escape pod.
100 young criminals that have been living in space on The Arch have been sent to Earth to test if it has become inhabitable after 97 years of being abandoned after a nuclear war.
On the series finale, Lisbon and Jane decided to get married but a killer bent on revenge may cost them their happy ending.
In an attempt to lure out a serial killer, Jane agrees to be used as bait by the FBI by pretending to be a renowned psychic.
Jane begins to suspect that the young man helping the FBI solve some murders, while claiming to have psychic powers, is actually the killer.
As the FBI tries to capture a gang of deadly armored car thieves, Jane takes extreme measures.
Abbott's career is at risk, so Jane hatches a dicey plan to save Abbott's job and freedom.
With a skilled assassin coming after a murder investigation witness, Jane fears for Lisbon's safety when the FBI gets between the assassin and his target.
Lisbon's unsuccessful younger brother, Jimmy, is a key witness in a murder investigation.
A DEA raid goes badly and the FBI is asked to consult on it, but Abbott's put in a sticky situation when his old boss attempts to blackmail him into protecting the DEA.
Jane crosses paths with a powerful military colonel and gets inspired to reopen a closed case involving the murder of the colonel's wife.

Jane has a head cold, so he stays in the office and instructs his coworkers on a homicide case, which is connected to a counterfeit diamond operation. Meanwhile, Abbott fears a misdeed in his past could prevent his wife from getting a promotion.
Jane heads to Beirut to reunite with an enemy, femme fetale Erica Flynn, who agrees to betray her boyfriend in order to get amnesty from the FBI.
Lisbon heads to prison on an undercover assignment, where she tries to bond with an inmate so she can persuade her to betray her criminal boyfriend, the powerful head of a car-theft ring.
In the seventh-season opener, Jane and Lisbon keep quiet about their new romance while investigating an undercover agent's homicide. Meanwhile, a young, enthusiastic agent joins the team.
In the sixth-season finale, a new lead in a cold case surfaces, forcing Lisbon to postpone her plans to relocate, and this delay allows Jane to examine his feelings for her and decide how to proceed.
The head of a kidnapping ring is sought by Jane and Lisbon as the victims begin to run out of time. Meanwhile, Lisbon makes her decision about whether to move to Washington, D.C., with Agent Pike.

A grand jury is convened to review Red John's murder and determine if Jane should be tried. Meanwhile, Lisbon wonders what Jane's reaction would be if she relocated with Agent Pike; and Cho and Abbot track some new leads in the human-smuggling ring.
Jane unearths a human-smuggling ring after he encounters a curious-looking stranger. Meanwhile, Lisbon ponders moving to Washington, D.C., with Pike.
The rich and famous may have met their match when Jane breaches an elite men's-only social club in order to find the killer of a woman who was found dead nearby.
With only two days before a man is executed, the FBI and Jane attempt to solve a cold case and prove the man is innocent.
Jane's latest ruse is a dangerous sting operation to catch art thieves. An FBI agent from the art squad hits it off with Lisbon.
Jane must use his skills to rescue Grace after she's kidnapped by the killer hunting former CBI members. The prime suspect looks to have an airtight alibi and time is running out.
Jane and Fischer investigate a murder at an oil fracking site, while Rigsby and Van Pelt travel to Austin to help investigate suspects in the string of attacks on former CBI members.

When a U.S. attorney is found dead in Mexico with no record of having crossed the border, Jane joins a separatist group to determine if it's murder or a government conspiracy. LaRoche joins with Rigsby and Van Pelt to uncover who's stalking former CBI members.

When a high-tech map maker is murdered, Jane and the FBI investigate the possibility that he may have unearthed a spy ring before he was killed. Elsewhere, Rigsby and Van Pelt are caught up in a disturbing conspiracy.
When several DEA agents are murdered, the FBI is assigned to find the killer, which sends Jane on a date with a gorgeous woman linked to the case.
The FBI grudgingly sign up Jane when they need help finding a missing computer programmer, but he won't agree until Lisbon is hired too.

It's been two years since the Red John case was solved. Jane is a wanted man who's found peace in South America, where he's hiding out. Although he wants nothing more to do with crime solving, an unexpected job offer could change everything.
After ten years of searching, Jane finally meets up with Red John, the man who murdered his wife and daughter.
After the events at Jane's house, the CBI's priority turns to those names still left on the Red John list. Jane finally thinks he knows the identity of Red John.
Jane tries to get all his remaining Red John suspects in one place so, with the final clue, he can reveal the killer's identity.
Jane hopes to find an important clue about Red John by investigating the death of a prominent Visualize member.
Several men are in danger because a list of fake Red John suspects Jane planted has been stolen.
The CBI's case in Napa gives Jane a chance to concentrate on Sheriff McAllister. Rigsby and Van Pelt finally make it down the aisle.
When a software engineer is taken out by a drone strike, the CBI steps in to investigate. The team comes upon four of the Red John suspects just as Jane finds an important clue to Red John's methods.

The CBI team investigates the murder of a man missing for two years. Jane and Lisbon continue to investigate the list of their seven Red John suspects which include Bret Stiles, Gale Bertram, Ray Haffner, Reede Smith, Robert Kirkland, Sheriff Thomas McCallister and Brett Partridge.
Red John kills again just as Jane narrows down the suspect list to seven and the victim has a connection to Jane's past.
When J.J. LaRoche's mysterious container is stolen from his home, he asks Jane for his help.

When a woman dies after talking with a radio love doctor, Rigsby and Van Pelt are sent undercover to investigate. Posing as a couple with relationship problems may do more than just shed light on the case.
The CBI investigate when the owner of a wild west tourist town is found dead. Agent Kirkland attempts to discover just how much Jane knows about Red John.
When the lead in the local theater production dies, the CBI is called on to investigate. Jane is determined to question comatose Jason Lennon about Red John.
The body of an army medic who dealt with PTSD patients is investigated by the CBI team.
When Lorelei returns to figure out Red John's role in her sister's death, Jane must tell Lisbon how he helped her escape from prison.
The CBI investigate the murder of an elderly heiress in her spooky mansion.
The CBI investigates in a case involving academia and a graduate student at a natural history museum to see if these students are into more than just academics.
The CBI work a 25 year old case which is connected to Visualize and Red John. Lisbon also thinks about her future after the arrest of Tommy Volker.
Lisbon believes that the death of a geologist is the key to bringing down Tommy Volker.
The team investigate the murder of a young model at an expensive rehab center and Lisbon continues looking into Tom Volker's activities.
The team's investigation of a murdered botanist brings them into the world of medical marijuana. Cho runs into Summer while working with the rapid response team.
The CBI looks into the murder of a former gang member turned real estate agent. Jane continues his quest for to Red John.
Jane enlists the help of Brett Stiles in order to orchestrate an elaborate plan to break Lorelei out of jail in the hopes she'll lead him to Red John.
Jane insists on pursuing his own leads to find Lorelei as the team investigates the murder of a reporter.
Jane continues his search for Lorelei while the team is investigating a confusing case of a kidnapped couple.
In the 100th episode we go back to see how Lisbon and the team first met Jane.
The team must find out if a long-standing gang war is the reason Rigsby's father is found injured at a crime scene.
Jane the CBI team are trying to find the killer of a bank employee, who was murdered during a heist. Lisbon is pulled deeper into the rivalry between the CBI and the FBI.
A girl who claims to be his late daughter, Charlotte, distracts Jane during the investigation of a murdered diamond cutter.
While Jane searches for Lorelei's connection to Red John, the CBI team - aided by the FBI - tackles the murder of a hotel employee.
The CBI team looks into the murder of a John Doe. When Jane fails again in his attempt to defeat Red John, he hits rock bottom, finds a lover and things go downhill from there.

Red John taunts Jane on the ninth anniversary of his wife and daughter's death. With Jane's attention diverted and his concentration wavering, the current investigation and his CBI career are put at risk.

isim: So Long, and Thanks for All the Red Snapper
description: The investigation into the death of a surfer reunites Lisbon with her former fiancé. Cho is beginning to question why he's with Summer.
The CBI investigate the death of a young man found outside a cabaret and who was bullied by everyone on their suspect list.
While Cho and Summer hide their relationship, Jane and the CBI try to determine who killed a popular English teacher. Rigsby nervously awaits the birth of his child.
Jane runs into a stage magician from his tour days while he and the CBI are investigating the murder of a casino employee.
The murder of a wealthy salesman with terminal cancer is investigated by the CBI. Cho must confront things that he's been trying hard to avoid.

Jane goes along with Agent Darcy's request for his help even though he suspects she's intentionally keeping something concealed. After a woman is murdered following a meeting with someone in an online chat room, the CBI steps in to investigate.
When an anti-cult activist is murdered, Jane must determine if cult leader Bret Stiles is responsible.
When Erica Flynn, someone Jane helped convict of murder, claims to have information about the death of a charity worker, Jane has her furloughed in exchange for that information.
While the jury deliberates, Jane tries to prove a woman charged with murder is innocent. While helping Cho with a case, Summer may have gone too far.
The CBI team must determine who killed a disgraced clothing designer who was on the verge of a comeback. FBI Agent Darcy hasn't finished with her investigation into Red John.
The CBI don't have much to go on when a mob boss' son is killed and Van Pelt is troubled by recollections of O'Laughlin's shooting.

Jane and the CBI team investigate the murder of a high-end divorce attorney, with many enemies, after he is killed on his speed boat. Meanwhile, Agent Darcy questions Jane about Red John's involvement in Panzer's murder.
Jane almost drowns while investigating a fireman's murder and loses his memory, turning him into his old con man self.
Jane and Lisbon are investigating the murder of an NFL star who was blown up in a car explosion while Rigsby and Harrigan take their relationship to the next level.
In order to determine who killed an undercover narc, Jane and the CBI team must go back over every step of her investigation.
The CBI team is trying to find a serial killer while Jane encounters a blogger who has devoted his life to finding the killer.

isim: Where in the World is Carmine O'Brien
description: While trying to solve the murder of a police chief Lisbon runs into her brother Tommy, a bounty hunter, who's tracking a bail jumper.
An island off the coast of California holds clues to a murdered woman. Rigsby worries that because he has a new girlfriend, Van Pelt will feel uncomfortable around him.
While Lisbon looks into the death of a photographer at a political rally, Jane has his sights set on proving a man carrying a gun at the same rally is a psychopath with murder on his mind.
A former client, who still believes that Jane was a psychic, asks for help when her son is kidnapped.
The CBI has a new supervising agent, Ray Haffner, while Patrick Jane is trying to get his team back together.
After being imprisoned, Patrick Jane has to prove that the man he shot really was Red John. Meanwhile, Lisbon is trying to persuade Van Pelt to seek counseling in the aftermath of her fiancé's death.
Patrick Jane's explosive confrontation with Red John has unintended consequences.
Red John's CBI mole is revealed which leads to a highly emotional confrontation with Patrick Jane.
The Northern California Symphony Orchestra comes under questioning when one of its violinists is shot to death. Cho has his hands full when he has to deal with a bright and talented young pickpocket.
Patrick Jane suspects a state prison inmate is the killer of a prison guard who was stabbed to death outside a jewelry store. Rigsby decides to ask his father what he knows about the murder.
Patrick Jane's life just got complicated. He's presented with two robberies gone bad and one of them involves Donny Culpepper, a former suspect, who Jane hired to get into LaRoche's house.

The CBI team investigates a shooting death after the body of a man who owned an online matchmaking service is found floating in the marina. Patrick Jane is determined to prove that the owner's manipulative wife is the killer.
A man who claims to have been abducted by aliens is murdered and his body is stolen from the coroner's van. Van Pelt moves ahead with her wedding plans.

The CBI investigates the murder of a doctor who was found dead on the golf course driving range. Suspects include the hospital staff and the patients. LaRoche is placed in charge of the CBI and appoints Cho as the new team leader.
The CBI team is under suspicion when a museum antiques dealer is murdered. Evidence seems to suggest that one member of the team is responsible.
In what's a first, Agent Hightower and Patrick Jane are forced to work together in the field after Lisbon is injured during the investigation of a dead miner.
Van Pelt comes under suspicion when the witness in her protective custody is murdered.
Jane's quick thinking is needed when he and others are held at gunpoint by an armed man accused of murder.

Competition is in the air when Patrick Jane goes head to head with a criminal profiler that the CBI has been assigned to work with. Both are out to prove their methods are the better way to solving a double murder.
While LaRoche continues his Todd Johnson murder investigation, the CBI turns its attention to a professional fighting murder case.

After the death of a Santa, the CBI follows leads that take them to an AA group and the National Society of Authentic Santas. An independent investigator questions Jane about the death of last episode's suspect.
Ellis Mars, a local astrologer, helps Patrick Jane solve a triple murder involving two policemen and an EMT's fiancé.
The CBI team must go back through years of casework when Jane is kidnapped. The list of suspects is extremely long as they realize almost everyone he's ever dealt with might want to harm him.
A building explodes while Jane and the CBI team are inside investigating a death threat. Lisbon meets up again with billionaire Walter Mashburn and sparks fly.
The CBI team is at a loss when a murder and missing person occurs on an extremely well-guarded wealthy family's compound.
The CBI team is called upon to look into the murder of a well-known jockey.
Jane and the rest of the team investigate the murder of a convict who was released on DNA evidence.
Cult leader Bret Stiles offers Jane information on Red John and the disappearance of Kristina to defuse their rivalry.
When Jane's brother-in-law returns to town and gets mixed up in a murder investigation, Jane must come to his aid despite personal reservations.
After his encounter with Red John, Patrick rethinks his future with the CBI. At the same time, the team investigates two high-profile kidnappings.

When the CBI conducts an investigation into a murder committed by a Red John copycat, Jane convinces Hightower not to let Kristina Frye help in the case, but then she tries to contact the real Red John on TV.
When the CBI team investigates the death of top charity organizer Hector Brava, Patrick is reunited with the psychic Kristina Frye.
The CBI investigate the murder of a math genius by a gun-toting clown along with the victim's missing index finger.
The CBI are called to the murder of Xander Harrington, a wealthy media corporation's CEO. The investigation leads to the Visualize Self-Realization Center, a cult-like religious group.

After the murder of ADA Kelly Flower, Jane quickly identifies her killer. The CBI team find out he may be a serial killer but have no proof for it. When they discover him to be a hitman, they set up an undercover operation.

Jane and the team discover a murder scene along with a woman covered in blood and suffering from amnesia, so now it is up to Jane to help her get her memory back.Meanwhile, Hightower addresses the issue of the romantic relationship between Rigsby and Van Pelt.
Jane and the team investigate the murder of a tutor and find a mysterious little red box near the body.Meanwhile, Lisbon is worried when Madeleine Hightower takes charge of the CBI.
After being poisoned with the toxin she was working on, bioweapons researcher Dr. Alicia Seberg asks Jane and the CBI to find her killer.
Jane and the team are asked to investigate the murder of Jeffrey Barge, a prominent chef, who was poisoned right at a best chef challenge.
Jane tags along with Cho who helps the police with a murder investigation with the victim being a fellow gang member from his early days, who also used to be his best friend.
When the body of Liselle Douglas, a beautiful, young car salesman, is found stuffed in the trunk of a high-end vehicle at an elite car dealership, Jane and the CBI are asked to investigate.

The CBI is assigned to investigate the murder of the mayor's media liaison, a case that draws the attention of the media. Reporter Mike Brewster is assigned to watch the team's work and take some interviews with the staff.
The CBI team investigate the double homicide of a couple murdered on their way to his high school reunion. Jane soon finds a link to an old high school prank.

The CBI team investigate the murder of a former professional baseball player, who has started his own baseball talent scouting and training facility for young up-and-coming baseball talents. During the investigation, Jane is knocked out by a baseball and flashes back to his past as a stage performer.
The CBI team investigates the murder of a wealthy jeweler who was killed during a robbery. However, the investigation takes an interesting turn for the worse when the prime suspect is found dead.
A fatal shooting inside the walls of CBI Headquarters puts Jane, Lisbon and the rest of the team back on the trail of Red John.

When two cases overlap, Minelli orders Bosco's and Lisbon's units to team up for the investigation of a kidnapping crime. Soon, the two different procedural approaches start to collide and cause tensions among the team members.

Bosco arrests Jane during a murder investigation and puts him behind bars for spying on Bosco's team and the Red John case. However, even in jail Jane manages to help Lisbon's team with the ongoing investigation.

The CBI are called to Beckworth Mansion, where a murdered body was found. The local deputy sheriff believes that Walter Beckworth's ghost haunts the mansion and killed the new owner, so the investigation is accompanied by a discussion about the existence of ghosts.
The CBI investigate the murder of a powerful and under-handed criminal attorney whose only client was one of California's most notorious motorcycle gangs.
After they receive an anonymous tip, the CBI team finds the dead body of a child molester Lisbon had arrested years ago together with Sam Bosco, now Lisbon quickly turns out to be the prime suspect.

The CBI are called in to investigate the death of Kristin Marley, a prominent state senator's aide, who was rumoured to have had an affair with the senator's husband.Meanwhile, Jane attempts to figure out what new information Sam Bosco and his team have discovered on the Red John case.

Minelli decides to assign the Red John case to Sam Bosco, when he thinks that Lisbon and Jane are too close to the case. Jane thereafter decides to solve one more case, then leave the CBI. They investigate the murder of a woman who is found suffocated after being accused of stealing a million dollars from her employer.moreless
As the CBI investigates the murder of a young girl and the abduction of her twin sister, everything points towards Red John's return. However, Patrick Jane thinks somebody else is involved as well.

Patrick Jane must find a way to convince a group of students at a wilderness program for troubled kids to tell him the truth about the circumstances leading to the death of one of their fellow students.
When the CEO and founder of a software company vanishes from his yacht, Jane and the CBI team are asked to investigate.
Jane and the CBI set out to determine who is responsible for the Mob-style execution of a man in the Witness Protection Program.

CBI investigates the murder of Hollywood movie producer Felix Hanson. Evidence leads to the belief that drugs are involved, but further investigations indicate a connection to a running movie production of a film called "A Dozen Roses".
Jane and the CBI track down a person, who hypnotizes people into doing the dirty work for them.
The CBI investigates a written threat when the personnel director of Carnelian Inc. plummets to his death at Jane's feet during a skydiving exercise.
When Patrick is left temporarily blinded after an explosion, he finds himself using unusual methods to investigate the death of a financial advisor that somehow seems to be connected to himself.
A woman is poisoned at a country club, while a party is in full swing, so the CBI is called to investigate. The team soon finds out, that each of the suspects is hiding something.
The CBI goes to investigate the death of a married woman, who was murdered while in bed with her lover.

A business tycoon's son-in-law is found dead near where a $50 million painting once hung in his father-in-law's office. Jane and the CBI try to find out how he might have been involved and who else is responsible.

When Cody Elkins, a high school football star, is found murdered, all trails point to the local witch, as her motive could be revenge for Cody stealing, torturing and killing her cat. When the CBI goes to investigate, she admits to having put a killing spell on Cody, but Jane still shows skepticism.moreless
A convicted murderer convinces Jane to help prove his innocence by telling Jane that he would give him information on Red John. Jane quits CBI to devote all of his time to getting him released.
Patrick Jane becomes very interested in a new case involving his former psychiatrist, who is the victim's ex-wife and also the prime suspect.
A murder in a small town is investigated and soon turns out to be an act of vengeance.

CBI are called to a murder scene, when the State's witness in a drug trial and a girl are found dead in a motel room. Local police are quick to decide that Rick Carass, the drug dealer on trial, is behind the murder, but Patrick Jane thinks otherwise.
When Rosemary Tennant becomes the victim of a hit and run, Patrick Jane takes on her psychic adviser, who claims to have foreseen her death, as he thinks she is a fraud.

A severed hand is found on the California-Nevada state line, that belongs to a murdered hotel casino owner. While the CBI team suspects a mafia hit, Patrick Jane uses the investigation as an opportunity to win at the cards tables.

A girl is found stabbed to death in the woods, and her best friend is missing. She is found covered in blood with a knife in her hand, which makes her the prime suspect, but she is suffering from memory loss. Patrick Jane uses his mentalist skills to help find out what really happened.moreless

Jason Sands, a wealthy banker and political contributor is found dead inside his residence vault. After being tortured, he had bled to death in his vault. Patrick and the team delve into Jason's private life to find the murderer.
A drowned girl's body is found on the Santa Marta beach, and many of her surfer friends are suspects. When interviews lead to nothing, Patrick uses his skills to determine and catch the killer.

The CBI is called in to investigate the murder of a young woman, found tied up and dumped in a Northern Napa County vineyard. Lisbon focuses on the theory that this was the result of a lovers' quarrel, but Jane believes this may be the work of a serial killer. He investigates his own theories and gets the team's assistance with a plan to catch the killer.moreless

This episode introduces us to the complex life of Patrick Jane, a consultant with the California Bureau of Investigation with a troubled past who has a keen eye for detail. When a man and woman are found dead in their home, many believe they are victims of a serial killer, but Patrick knows better and must prove that this was not the work of Red John.moreless
Season 6 ends with Alicia getting a suspicious call from a client and discovering that he's being held in a secret police facility where people are detained without officially being booked.
Alicia recalls her earlier days as a lawyer when a former client calls her after being charged with a murder that is tied to a case from 2009.

Potential voter fraud is discovered in the State's Attorney election, and Eli and Alicia take steps to stop a recount by enlisting the help of a well-respected civil rights lawyer. Meanwhile, Diane learns she unwittingly submitted false evidence in Cary's case.

Alicia is questioned about leaked emails during a TV interview. Meanwhile, Diane takes a case that pits her sympathies toward gay marriage against the rights of religious freedom; and an investigator begins looking into the evidence Diane used to get Cary out of prison.

The partners at Florrick/Agos/Lockhart argue over the future of the firm. Meanwhile, the firm becomes a victim of a cyber hack after it represents a movie producer whose work is pirated on a peer-to-peer sharing site.

Alicia's political future is on the line when Peter gives an interview that could influence voter turnout on Election Day. Meanwhile, Diane goes on a weekend getaway with Kurt and his affluent hunting buddies, and she hopes it will lead to her landing a prosperous new client for the firm.

Frank Prady attacks Peter's gubernatorial record as a campaign tactic, which forces Alicia to consider doing the same. Meanwhile, the firm takes the case of a man who was paralyzed by a malfunctioning gun created by a 3D printer, and Diane's husband testifies as an expert witness, which leads to a rift between them.moreless

Alicia prepares for a key interview that could have a big impact on the outcome of the race for State's Attorney. Meanwhile, Louis Canning pressures Florrick/Agos/Lockhart to agree on a settlement in his wrongful eviction case against the firm.
Diane and Cary represent Colin Sweeney when he accuses a TV producer of basing an unflattering character and show on him. Meanwhile, Alicia competes against Frank Prady for a major campaign donation.
Alicia and Frank Prady appear in a crucial debate in the race for State's Attorney, while Peter and the city of Chicago prepare for a potential riot.
Cary hires a prison consultant to prepare him for incarceration. Meanwhile, Alicia practices for the State's Attorney candidates' debate.

Cary's case goes to trial and he considers a plea deal that would send him to jail. Meanwhile, a joke between mother and daughter lands Alicia in trouble as her campaign for State's Attorney shifts into full gear.

Alicia faces a crisis of conscience when she is encouraged to be negative in her campaign for State's Attorney. Meanwhile, the Feds try to persuade Cary to work with them as they attempt to build a case against Lemond Bishop.

Alicia takes on a college rape case that pits her against Louis Canning when it moves from a university hearing to civil court. Meanwhile, Eli and Elfman conduct a political focus group as Alicia dives deeper into her campaign for State's Attorney.

Finn discovers a potentially devastating piece of evidence against Cary that could impact Alicia and Peter. Meanwhile, Eli becomes wary when a new prospective candidate emerges in the race for State's Attorney.

Alicia and Elsbeth put their legal battle aside when the government brings economic espionage charges against both of their clients. Meanwhile, Diane tries to move her new firm into the Lockhart/Gardner/Canning office space, which leads to a fight with her former partners David Lee and Louis Canning.

Alicia and Dean face familiar foes in Elsbeth Tascioni and Rayna Hecht when they represent a fired female CEO in a sex discrimination suit. Meanwhile, the Florrick/Agos/Lockhart firm are in panic mode when a hacker seizes control of their files and threatens to delete them if a ransom demand isn't met.moreless
Alicia explores the option of running for State's Attorney. To help her decide, Eli brings in a respected campaign manager.

Alicia scrambles to hold onto the firm's biggest client as Florrick/Agos continues to struggle with an internal legal crisis. Meanwhile, Diane plots her move from Lockhart/Gardner and hunts for partners to bring with her to the new firm.

Season 6 begins with Alicia refusing to run for State's Attorney despite Eli's attempts to persuade her to launch a campaign. Meanwhile, Diane considers joining Florrick/Agos as a partner, but an internal crisis threatens to destroy the firm.

Season 5 ends with Alicia and Cary learning about a threat to the firm when an open feed from a camera is left on following a teleconferenced deposition with Lockhart/Gardner. Meanwhile, Louis Canning vies for a larger role at LG; and Alicia entrusts plans for Zach's high-school graduation party to Jackie and Veronica.moreless

Alicia manages the fallout when her corporate CEO client's insensitive statements to the press threaten the fate of a multi-billion dollar merger. Meanwhile, Diane and Louis Canning take opposite sides in a class-action suit involving a pharmaceutical company; and Eli learns the truth about Alicia and Peter's relationship.

Alicia considers options outside of her marriage when she meets a handsome entrepreneur, while serving on jury duty. To help think through the situation, she consults her mother. Meanwhile, Diane helps some friends when their son is accused of selling drugs on the Internet.

Alicia becomes a reluctant witness when a body is discovered in Colin Sweeney's home while she is there. Meanwhile, an unfortunate picture of Zach threatens to become a public relations nightmare for Peter.

Alicia and Diane consider merging their firms in the wake of Will's death, even as they take opposite sides in a contentious divorce case. Meanwhile, Alicia offers her assistance to Finn when it becomes clear that the State's Attorney is looking for a scapegoat in the Jeffrey Grant case.

Alicia enlists Cary as her lawyer when she is deposed as part of the voter-fraud investigation. Meanwhile, Will goes up against a new prosecutor who proves to be a formidable adversary in the Jeffrey Grant case.

Alicia looks to her past for inspiration when she is asked to deliver the keynote address at an American Bar Association conference in New York City. Meanwhile, the competition between Florrick-Agos and Lockhart-Gardner ramps up as each firm tries to align with a powerful Manhattan lawyer; and Will turns to an old acquaintance when it becomes clear that Nelson Dubeck's investigation into voter fraud isn't going away.moreless
Lockhart/Gardner faces off against Alicia over money left in a will.
Lockhart/Gardner gets a new lawyer that makes an immediate impact.
Alicia tries to stop a man from being deported to Mexico.
Alicia and Cary believe Lockhart/Gardner is spying on them.
Lockhart/Gardner and Florrick/Agos battle for clients after their plan to leave is exposed.
Alicia's plan to leave is being made public, which causes her and Cary to work things out with a lot of their clients. Kalinda needs to make a decision regarding her loyality.
Alicia tries to help a surrogate mother keep her baby.
Will makes Alicia an offer that has her reconsider leaving.
Alicia and Cary get involved in a complicated case with Chumhum.
Alicia tries to balance one final case, saving a convict from being executed, while planning her exit from Lockhart Gardner.

When Zach suspects to have seen vote tampering he asks Alicia and her firm to bring it to court, but they are not surprised for a surprise twist. Eli and Peter get the results of the election, while Alicia has a few choices to make. Kalinda and Robyn are both asked by Cary to join him.moreless

Lockhard Gardner takes on a case which involves a big group of people that just got fired and who want to create an union. Meanwhile Peter asks Alicia something important, and Alicia's mother pushes Will to make a decision regarding his love for Alicia. Kalinda has doubts as to where she wants to do in the future as Cary asks her to follow him to his new firm. And the election is coming closer and closer for Peter and Eli.moreless
Alicia and Will are representing a girl who says she's been raped. Alicia uses Robyn to find out about a secret Cary has been keeping, while Diane is asked to make a tough choice.

Colin Sweeney and his wife return to Lockhart Gardner asking for help, while Robyn is slowly finding herself at the firm. Diane gets a visit from Kurt, and Laura questions Will's connection with Alicia.

Flashbacks are the name of the game in tonight's wild adventure. After the murder of a client in broad daylight on State Street, the firm must deal with the possibility Alicia and even her children maybe next. Meanwhile Peter is trying to round up 800,000 Catholic votes with a hug, while also trying to relieve pressure from the state DNC. On the family front maternal Grandmother Veronica lets drop the truth with results that bring old issues out into the light.moreless

Will and Alicia team up to defend a woman who is about to collect her life insurance money after her husband dies in a what seems accident. Kalinda is forced to work together with Jess. Cary's father returns with an interesting offer for the firm.
Alicia is asked to defend Lemon Bishop once again but soon learns she has to team up with another lawyer who has his own agenda. Kalinda learns the firm is about to hire a new investigator.
Carrie Preston returns as 'Elsbeth Tascioni', when she has to defend Eli against multiple charges. Meanwhile the campaign is heading in unknown territory.

When Alicia & Cary receive some surprising news regarding their carreer, they are asked to participate in a courtroom battle against their bosses so that potential clients know which outcome they can expect. Will and Diane fear that some of their employers are about to leave the firm. The returning Carrie Preston (Elsbeth Tascioni) discovers that the feds are after Eli with some dirty tricks.moreless

Elsbeth Tascioni asks Alicia to defend her client in a special French court when she's thrown in jail because of unseen circumstances. Eli fears the Feds are making a case against him which forces Peter to work closer with Jordan (Grey's Anatomy's T.R. Knight).

Will defends a man accused of murder, the same charge another person in a nearby county is facing. Meanwhile Kalinda has a hard choice to make when Nick's actions are becoming more dangerous by the minute. Alicia finds proof that her kids are growing up faster than she thought.
Alicia is surprised when Owen and their mother are coming by for a visit while she also has to deal with a tough case which involves a gay couple.
Will struggles to deal with a judge from one of his cases who made a comment about him outside the courtroom.

As a very crowded Lockhart & Gardner continue their business, we learn that Kalinda's husband, Nick Saverese, loses the government bid to a competitor he now asks the attorneys to investigate for bribery. Military Judge Lenora Kuhn consults Alicia to assist a colleague with a civil case against an alleged rapist. Lockhart Gardner must help to cover up Mr. Bishop's illegal business. Meanwhile, Eli struggles to deal with a blog that posted a story about Peter.

The firm represents the parents of a murdered boy who sue the school for having something to with their son's murder. Eli and Kalinda try to find proof Peter didn't sleep with another campaign worker ; and Maddie expresses her problems with the campaign. She also develops a slow friendship with Alicia.moreless

Lockhart Gardner represents two women who believe their website was sabotaged by a competitor. Meanwhile, Eli tries to cover up a story about an affair that may damage Peter's campaign. Kalinda involves Lana Delenay in the already complicated relationship she has with Nick.

While Will is trying his first case since his suspension, the firm is still in financial danger which leads them to the decision to make a new payment arrangement with their new landlord. Eli and Peter receive good news regarding their campaign, and Kalinda struggles with the return of her husband.moreless
Alicia must help Zach in a case against a corrupt police officer. Meanwhile, the firm is facing financial difficulties.
Patti Nyholm teams up with Louis Canning with mysterious motives planned for Lockhart-Gardner.
Alicia defends a judge facing misconduct charges and Kalinda visits Lana Delaney. Meanwhile, Cary makes a career change.
Alicia counsels a client whether to accept a strict plea deal. Meanwhile, Peter's newest political rival forces her back into the public spotlight.
Alicia is invited to join a blue ribbon panel investigating the details behind a police shooting. She appears to be the only member interested in discovering the truth.
Alicia faces off against Louis Canning in the courtroom, but discovers that she may have reason to join his firm.
A sexual misconduct claim sends Alicia to help out Colin Sweeney, who is struggling to gain back control of his company.

Alicia's defense client is a documentary filmmaker accused of being the one responsible for a college girl's suicide. Will continues to serve his suspension at home with his two sisters keeping watch. Peter's campaign struggles when he realizes he has lost allies after hiring others based on merit only.

Lockhart/Gardner leads a class action suit against a software company that allowed the Syrian government to "disappear" American citizens. Also, Will faces a hard decision in the wake of the Grand Jury proceedings.
Will's judicial bribery case goes before a grand jury.

Alicia defends a client charged with protecting the identity of the creator of an illegal currency. Meanwhile, Elsbeth still defends Will as he's a suspect in a bribe with several judges. Kalinda is also trying to find a way to help Will but finds out he is not the only party ( Cary, Dana & Wendy Scott Carr ) that might need her help.moreless
Lockhart-Gardner faces trouble when a recently divorced couple claims the law firm influenced their separation for their own personal gain.

Lockhart-Gardner's Legal Aid offers support to a policewoman who is accused of shooting her husband for insurance money. Alicia makes a sudden realization about her personal life, and Will finds out a shocking detail about Wendy's investigation.
When someone close to Alicia goes missing she realises she has a tough decision to make. Kalinda makes a move that puts her closer to Alicia again. Michael J Fox returns as Louis Canning.
Will and Alicia must go to military court.
Alicia rushes to stop an execution so she can help one of her clients and Eli works damage control.

Lockhart-Gardner takes on the U.S. Government for a military contractor who claims that he was tortured by the army in Afghanistan.
